about: I have a tireless intellectual curiosity. My hobby has always been to create things, from small toys with LEGOS to real electronic gadgets for personal use. I'm always programming something, I always have a project in mind. This attitude of creating things has led me to self learn programming of microcontrollers, web and mobile applications. My professional goal is to provide a quality service, a trustworthy person, a strong leader who will do everything possible to keep production and innovation in optimal values. Always ready to solve problems using engineering, code, dedication and a lot of coffee.

activities: Ensure the correct operation of all equipments on plant
Supervise and asign tasks to field technician operators daily
Plan an execute daily equipment field inspections
Report and optimize production, consumption and performace values
Create the Operations Manual for every equipment in plant
Ensure the reliable operation of a 35MW steam turbine and generator unit
Attend and control of emergencies like homeloads, blackouts or operation failures
Supervise the correct maintenace and operation of equipments during shutdowns
